member.name: T:Conferenti.Domain.Sessions.Session
member.summary: Detailed information about a session given by a speaker

member.name: P:Conferenti.Domain.Sessions.Session.SessionId
member.summary: The Session id used to get session details

member.name: P:Conferenti.Domain.Sessions.Session.Title
member.summary: Title of the session

member.name: P:Conferenti.Domain.Sessions.Session.Slug
member.summary: Slug of the session

member.name: P:Conferenti.Domain.Sessions.Session.Tags
member.summary: Tags associated with the session

member.name: P:Conferenti.Domain.Sessions.Session.Description
member.summary: Description of the session

member.name: P:Conferenti.Domain.Sessions.Session.StartTime
member.summary: Start time of the session

member.name: P:Conferenti.Domain.Sessions.Session.EndTime
member.summary: End time of the session

member.name: P:Conferenti.Domain.Sessions.Session.Room
member.summary: Room where the session is held

member.name: P:Conferenti.Domain.Sessions.Session.Level
member.summary: Level of the session (e.g., Beginner, Intermediate, Advanced)

member.name: P:Conferenti.Domain.Sessions.Session.Format
member.summary: Format of the session (e.g., Workshop, Lecture, Panel)

member.name: P:Conferenti.Domain.Sessions.Session.Language
member.summary: Language in which the session is conducted

member.name: T:Conferenti.Domain.Sessions.SessionFormat
member.summary: Represents the format of a session in an event or conference.
member.remarks: This enumeration defines the possible types of sessions, such as lectures, workshops, panels, and keynotes. It can be used to categorize or filter sessions based on their format.

member.name: T:Conferenti.Domain.Sessions.SessionLevel
member.summary: Represents the skill or experience level of a session.
member.remarks: This enumeration is typically used to categorize sessions based on their intended audience.

member.name: T:Conferenti.Domain.Speakers.Speaker
member.summary: Response model for speaker

member.name: P:Conferenti.Domain.Speakers.Speaker.Id
member.summary: The Speaker id used to get session details

member.name: P:Conferenti.Domain.Speakers.Speaker.Name
member.summary: Full name of the speaker

member.name: P:Conferenti.Domain.Speakers.Speaker.Position
member.summary: Position of the speaker in the company

member.name: P:Conferenti.Domain.Speakers.Speaker.Company
member.summary: Company associated with the speaker

member.name: P:Conferenti.Domain.Speakers.Speaker.Bio
member.summary: The biography of the speaker

member.name: P:Conferenti.Domain.Speakers.Speaker.PhotoUrl
member.summary: Url of speaker. Usually stored in CDN.

member.name: P:Conferenti.Domain.Speakers.Speaker.Sessions
member.summary: Speaker sessions associated with the event.
